attributes.action: Make motorway services and truckstops healthier
attributes.additional_details: By making every food outlet in the services and truckstops change their menus and have at least 25% of healthy options, we can make a start against obesity.
attributes.background: Last week I was out with a lorry all week and it was impossible to buy healthy food. Everything was fat fried or dripping in oil in an attempt to keep it 'fresh'. Even the 'healthy' options are full of fat and salt.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the Government to make it law for motorway services to provide healthy food options.
